item.description:
Here's the description from the Simple Gifts Coffee House web site:

"The Simple Gifts Team is thrilled to welcome back one of our favorite performers to our stage! A seasoned performer with many CDs to his credit, a consummate storyteller, and now the published author of an autobiographical collection of twelve poignant, humorous stories, Memoirs of a C Student, Don White will take you on a roller coaster ride of hilarious peaks and heart-quieting moments recalling your own most human experiences through the telling of his own stories in spoken word and songs."

Tickets are $16 in advance, $18 at the door.

Last year they let me email them my RSVP list 2 days in advance and would let those people pay the advance price at the door. They could always revoke my privilege if I get too many no-shows or if they expect a sellout.
You can also pay them via paypal.

Coffee and snacks are available there, for a suggested donation.

See http://www.uunashua.o...
and http://www.uunashua.o...

If you arrive late I can't promise to hold a seat for you with us.
I'm listing this event with other groups too.

Assistant organizer Neil
item.name: Humorous Folk Music Coffee House - Don White
